name: Spaghetti Pizza
description: A scrumptious mashup of two family favourites! It's a saucy spaghetti pie, made with our classic Marinara Sauce and topped with melty cheese and pepperoni like your favourite 'za, all baked to bubbly, golden-brown perfection.
preparation:
1. Preheat oven to 375° F. Break spaghetti noodles into thirds.   
  2. In a large pot, cook pasta according to package directions. Drain and rinse under cold water.   
  3. While pasta is cooking, in a very large bowl, combine eggs, 1⁄2 cup mozzarella, milk, and hot dip mix.   
  4. Add cooked spaghetti to bowl; mix until well combined. Spread spaghetti mixture into Round Steamer. Use a spatula or a large spoon to pat firmly into pan.  
  5. Spread marinara sauce over noodles. Top with remaining 1 1⁄2 cups mozzarella, and then pepperoni slices.   
  6. Bake 25 min or until cheese is melted and golden-brown. Let stand 5 min before slicing into wedges and serving.
tips:
Swap pepperoni slices with cooked Italian sausage or your favourite vegetarian ground round.

To slice into wedges without damaging the silicone steamer, use a butter knife or silicone tool, like the Flipper or Sauté Spoon.
